passive.name: Deflagration
passive.description: When the wearer's cumulative HP loss during one attack exceeds <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> of their Max HP, or if the amount of their own HP consumed at one time is greater than <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> of their Max HP, immediately heals the wearer for <unbreak>#3[i]%</unbreak> of their Max HP, and at the same time, increases the DMG they deal by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak></color> for <unbreak>#4[i]</unbreak> turn(s). This effect can only be triggered once every <unbreak>#5[i]</unbreak> turn(s).
